name: TheHelper.net dark
description:
Dark style for TheHelper.net. Used part of SD-DAken's style (http://userstyles.org/styles/15401). Works best with Dark Simple scroll bars. (http://userstyles.org/styles/32717)

> Just uncomment 
“ /*
body{background-image:url('http://homepages.physik.uni-muenchen.de/~georg.hennig/artificial_stars_m35.jpg') !important; background-repeat: repeat !important;
background-attachment: fixed !important;}
*/ ” 
for the background.
